messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] TACHI  and tai chi--resp to Tom Helm
messages.msgSnippet: Tom, Thanks a lot for taking the time to respond.  The comment was intended to be in general.  My own research interests have been largely in the later Age of
messages.messageBody:
Tom,
Thanks a lot for taking the time to respond. The comment was intended to be
in general. My own research interests have been largely in the later Age of
the Country at War, and therefore my knowledge of weaponry specifically relates
to that era. I will certainly look more deeply into Kamakura weaponry, and
I look forward to any further thoughts you share on this topic. Thanks,
Professor Murphy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
